resources.string: To whom have I the honor ?
You have to chose a profile to continue
What do you want to add

This stunning modern house boasts an architectural design that combines sleek, clean lines with elegant simplicity. The exterior is characterized by a combination of smooth white render, large glass windows, and natural wood accents, creating a harmonious balance between modernity and warmth. The house features a flat or low-pitched roof, adding to its contemporary aesthetic.

Classic Victorian architectural style, infused with a sense of eerie grandeur and mystery. This imposing structure is located in a historic neighborhood, exuding an old-world charm that belies its more sinister history.

A Parisian apartment typically embodies the essence of classic French elegance combined with modern chic. Nestled within a charming Haussmannian building, recognized for its stone facade, wrought iron balconies, and mansard roofs, the apartment exudes an air of historic sophistication.

A New York apartment in the Upper East Side exudes a blend of contemporary luxury and timeless sophistication, characteristic of one of Manhattan\'s most prestigious neighborhoods. These apartments, often located in classic pre-war buildings or sleek modern high-rises, offer a unique urban living experience.
"Nestled in the heart of lush, rolling hills, this magnificent Campaign House Estate offers a tranquil escape into nature's embrace. "
(To modify a value, simply click on it)
Select the agent responsible for this sale
You can\'t add a sold date to a not sold estate !
Choose at least one point of interest
Internet is required to see map
